commits.message: Change styling of list of repositories
Change Dashboard.UserController to be an Ember.ObjectController
Decouple repositories template from what type of repos are shown
Change context to be a Dashboard.User model instead of username
Add "loading ..." to repositories and events templates

payload.description: GitHub Dashboard using Ember.js and Twitter Bootstrap

issue.body:
I rebased the work that @laserlemon pushed in his pull request (#45) and ensured that `ENV` variables are not decrypted for pull requests.

I haven't added `TRAVIS_SECURE_ENV_VARS` and `TRAVIS_PULL_REQUEST` env vars yet, as I'm not sure what is the best place to do it. For now I added `pull_request` key to the API and I planned to export those variables in the worker, but I'm not familiar with travis' architecure yet, so I would like to get some feedback for this.

~~The other thing is that I don't like the fact that we need all or nothing approach. If you want to have secure `ENV` vars, you need to encrypt all of them and because of that there is no way to set both types of vars. Can I also address it in this pull request? And if yes, have you guys thought about approach to this problem or is this something that hasn't been discussed before?~~ (disregard this paragraph, travis is right, I'm wrong)
issue.title: Secure "env" configuration - continuation

commits.message: Implement "go to home" when clicking brand in menu bar

payload.description: GitHub Dashboard using Ember.js and Twitter Bootstrap

commits.message:
Output JavaScript files to assets/js/ and CSS files to assets/css/

This fixes #14

issue.body: The path resolved from the CSS is http://code418.com/img/glyphicons-halflings.png, but the files are located under the `dashboard` folder ...
issue.title: Somehow, the bootstrap icon are not shown on GitHub deployed dashboard

commits.message:
Implement :bump_version task

:release will do a :deploy, tag the current code base with current version and bump the version via :bump_version
Replace Dashboard.VERSION with version in VERSION file
Add RepositoryView, corresponding template and RepositoryController
Implement find for Repository on GitHubAdpater
Adapt findQuery to get events for a repository

Big one: add templates for GitHub events

The templates are taken from https://github.com/pangratz/ember.js-dashboard
Modify root.user.repository route to show events for a repository

issue.body: The path resolved from the CSS is http://code418.com/img/glyphicons-halflings.png, but the files are located under the `dashboard` folder ...
issue.title: Somehow, the bootstrap icon are not shown on GitHub deployed dashboard
Show all events for a repository

milestone.description:
First working version of the dashboard. Should offer the following features:

- show repositories of an user
- show followers of an user
- show followed users
- show watches repositories
- show events for a repository
- show events for an user
milestone.title: v0.1

issue.title: Show all events for a repository
